"Linking with \\"Phantasy Star Online 2:
"Any characters used to play both \\"Phantasy Star Online 2\\" and
\\"Phantasy Star Online 2 es\\" (hereafter \\"PSO2 es\\") will be have the following
elements interlinked.
・A portion of the XP gained from \\"PSO2 es\\".
・Shared Meseta Pool.
・Shared portion of the inventory.
・Weapons/Units/Costumes/Parts/etc.
・Shared Development Status of Mags.

For more details, please check out the \\"PSO2es\\" Online Manual.
